Wire End Connector

A wire end connector is essential in a horizontal lifeline system because it provides secure termination, proper tension, safe load handling, and durable performance

Premium Quality
Smart Design

A wire end connector is essential in a horizontal lifeline system because it provides secure termination, proper tension, safe load handling, and durable performance, making the system reliable and compliant with safety standards. The wire end connector serves as a critical component that ensures the safe and reliable termination of wire rope cables in horizontal lifeline systems.

Standard: EN 795 : 2012
Material: AISI 304 / 304L / 316
Allowable Working Load: 12 kN
Breaking Strength: 25 kN
Component Code: HHLC-07
Talk to a Safety Expert

Key Features

Secure Termination
EN 795:2012
Proper Tension
Reliable system
Safe Load Handling
25 kN strength
Durable Performance
Weather resistant
